findings.title: Insufficient vesting balance
findings.description: The code validates that there are enough tokens only for every single vesting. However, there is no validation verifying that the contract balance is enough to fulfill all those vesting records.

findings.title: Unrestricted function access
findings.description: The function can be called by everyone. This can lead to an undesired contract state.

findings.title: Missing events emitting
findings.description: "MemberAdded" events are not emitted in the constructor when new addresses are whitelisted.
